subject: X Games
Accidents and Safety
Snowmobiles
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The Winter X Games will keep the snowmobiling freestyle event as part of its program, adding extra precautions after Caleb Moore’s death from injuries he sustained in a crash last January in Aspen, Colo.
snippet: The Winter X Games will keep the snowmobiling freestyle event as part of its program, adding extra precautions after Caleb Moore’s death from injuries he sustained in a crash last January in Aspen, Colo.
